resources.string: Battleship is a long-standing two-player game from Milton Bradley in which the object is to sink the other players five hidden ships by calling out spots on a target grid to locate the fleet. A combination of luck and strategy will help players win the game by knocking out their opponents destroyer, submarine, cruiser, carrier and battleship.

This application was made by Fernando Hernandez( Zeta ) and Mariano Abdala, if you want to contact them write and email to fernando.hernandez@globallogic.com and mariano.abdala@globallogic.com. Thanks for using our game!!!!
